title: Check Loyalty Points Balance
description: A customer wants to know how many loyalty points they have and what they can be redeemed for.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's loyalty program balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer has 1,500 points.

tasks.description: Explain the redemption options (e.g., 500 points = $5 discount).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates how the points can be used.
